LE JEUX ET BIENT MES DOMMAGE QUE QUAND TES TROP FORT TU TE PREND UN TRUSTFACTOR DE MERDE DONC TOMBER QUA AVEC DES CHEATER et si ta reusi a tou lire likeeeee

One of the best multiplayer fps games ever for sure.

If you have a friend who plays CS:GO with you, you can play this game for hundreds of hours. Otherwise, it can get boring sometimes. Despite having about 2,000 hours on the game myself, I stopped playing seriously in 2017, but I still play from time to time on another account. A competitive/scrimmage game occasionally has been an enjoyable way of playing, easy going and without the annoyance of playing too seriously/too much! I would love more singleplayer content.

Hallo.

Es wird nix aber auch garnix dagegen unternommen. Das Spiel ist denn Tot geweit.

Рецепт пельменей:

Необходимые продукты для теста:

Мука — 2.5 стакана
Яйцо — 1 шт.
Вода — 1/3 стакана
Соль — 0.5 ч. л.

Для фарша:

Филе куриное — 500 г
Яйца — 4 шт.
Вареный рассыпчатый рис — 1 стакан
Зеленый лук — 1 пучок
Черный молотый перец — 1/3 ч. л.
соль — по вкусу
